sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you contact us through the contact form or make a sponsorship. This may include your name, email address, phone number, payment information for sponsorships, and any other information you choose to provide. For sponsorships, we may also collect your preferred display name and whether you wish to be publicly acknowledged.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to: respond to your comments, questions, and requests; communicate with you about projects, services, and opportunities; and carry out any other purpose for which the information was provided.

sections.title: 3. Sponsorship Information
sections.content: If you choose to sponsor through this website, we collect information necessary to process your sponsorship, including your name and payment details. By default, your name or chosen display name may be publicly displayed as a sponsor unless you explicitly opt out. You may request to remain anonymous by contacting us. Sponsorship amounts may be displayed in aggregate but individual amounts are kept private unless you choose to make them public.

sections.title: 4. Public Acknowledgments
sections.content: If you sponsor through this website and do not opt out, your name or chosen display name may be displayed on a public sponsors page or acknowledgments section. If you sponsor through third-party platforms like GitHub Sponsors, the visibility of your sponsorship is controlled by that platform's settings and privacy policy. You may contact us at any time to request removal from public acknowledgments.

sections.title: 5. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: This website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, though this may affect your ability to use certain features of the website.

sections.title: 8. Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

sections.title: 9. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the effective date. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.

sections.title: 11. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through the contact form on this website.
